item.title: Developing ImageJ Code with Atom
item.description: Overview atom-imagej-mode allows users to run ImageJ2 scripts from Atom. atom-imagej-mode is available [here](https://github.com/kephale/atom-imagej-mode). Installing atom-imagej-mode Enable the imagej-server update site (https://imagej.net/ImageJ_Server) in Fiji In Atom: Packages \ Settings View \ Install Packages/Themes Search for: atom-imagej-mode Install the package In Atom: Packages \ Settings View \ Manage Packages
